description: Short-term bullish continuation pattern resembling a small symmetrical triangle. Forms after a strong upward move (flagpole) and represents a brief consolidation before the uptrend resumes.
validationRules: Must follow a strong upward price move (flagpole)
Volume should decrease during pennant formation
Breakout occurs upward with volume spike
Flagpole should be steep and relatively vertical
invalidationSignals: Price breaks below the flagpole low
commonMistakes: Entering during pennant formation instead of waiting for breakout
Confusing with triangle pattern - pennant is much shorter duration
Ignoring the flagpole - must have strong prior move
Not measuring flagpole length for target calculation
Trading without volume confirmation on breakout

tradeSetup.entry: Breakout above upper pennant trendline with volume spike
tradeSetup.stopLoss: Below the lower pennant trendline or below flagpole midpoint
tradeSetup.target: Length of flagpole added to breakout point

supportive: Volume decreases during pennant, spikes on breakout
Moving averages remain in bullish alignment

confluenceFactors: Breakout aligns with round number resistance
